title: Seasonal Allergy Support with TCM
excerpt: Reduce sneezing and congestion by supporting Lung Qi and immunity.
author: Dr. Huang
contentMarkdown:
Seasonal allergies are often tied to weakened Lung Qi. TCM strengthens the body's defenses and reduces reactivity.

## Common Symptoms

- Sneezing and runny nose
- Itchy eyes
- Post-nasal drip

## TCM Support

Acupuncture and herbs can reduce inflammation and calm immune overreaction.
